project_plan.name: Weather Fetching Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches and displays current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Set up the project environment and install necessary libraries (e.g., requests)
Implement function to fetch weather data from a public API
Implement function to parse and display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Write tests for the fetch and display functions
Execute tests on the implemented functions to ensure they function correctly
